price: Wala usitembee katika ardhi kwa maringo. Hakika wewe huwezi kuipasua ardhi wala kufikia urefu wa milima.
arabic: وَلَا تَمۡشِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَرَحًاۖ إِنَّكَ لَن تَخۡرِقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَلَن تَبۡلُغَ ٱلۡجِبَالَ طُولٗا
footnotes: Wala usitembee katika ardhi kwa kiburi na majivuno. Kwani vyovyote utavyo fanya huwezi kuipasua ardhi kwa nguvu za mkanyago wako, na kama utavyo kuwa mrefu huwezi kuipita urefu milima.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walā tamshi fī al-arḍi maraḥan innaka lan takhriqa al-arḍa walan tablugha al-jibāla ṭūlan
